attributes.additional_details: People like AKA Chelsea Harwood and others who have had sex changes great it's a free world BUT for me as man I also have rights in this country it's not all about being labelled homophobic or whatever because for me if I met someone like this on a night out and they never declared they were born men and I'd had some sort of intimacy with them and people found out I'd seriously consider killing myself it's about time men had rights too and were protected from this, there must be a law of some kind to make teams genders have to declare their circumstances before hand so that a man or woman may have the choice to say no the government needs to act!
